Package Game

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
Game.Farm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
farm class is the environment the player plays in. the player may choose between different farm types for different bonuses. This is the biggest class and ties many of the other classes together through its methods and stores objects within its ArrayLists

    • Farm

      public Farm​(java.lang.String type, Farmer owner, int days)
      farm constructor with
      Parameters:
      type - string name to determine perk type
      owner - Farmer object of character created
      days - - total days the game will play for

  • Method Details

    • getFarmerInfo

      public java.lang.String getFarmerInfo()
      Returns:
      a string of the farmer's name and age to be displayed at the top of the game screen

    • getCurrentDay

      public int getCurrentDay()
      Returns:
      the current day the game is at

    • getTotalDays

      public int getTotalDays()
      Returns:
      the total days the game will last

    • getActionPoints

      public int getActionPoints()
      Returns:
      the amount of action points currently spent by the player this day

    • setMoney

      public void setMoney​(int amount)
      Parameters:
      amount - of money set for the farm

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      Returns:
      gets the current amount of money owned by farm

    • getPettingBonus

      public int getPettingBonus()
      Returns:
      1 if class perk petting bonus enabled 0 otherwise

    • getHappyDecay

      public int getHappyDecay()
      Returns:
      the amount of days remaining before animals will decay in happiness per day

    • getScore

      public float getScore()
      calculates the final score of the player at the end of the game
      Returns:
      a numerical value based off the player's current animals, money and total game duration

    • addAnimal

      public void addAnimal​(Animal animal)
      Parameters:
      animal - added to farm container

    • addCrop

      public void addCrop​(Crop crop)
      Parameters:
      crop - added to farm container harvestable 1 day earlier if class perk enabled

      public void addAnimalItem​(AnimalItem item)
      Parameters:

      Parameters:
      item - for crop added into farm inventory

    • getAnimals

      public java.util.ArrayList<Animal> getAnimals()
      Returns:
      a list of animal objects currently owned by the farm

      public java.util.ArrayList<AnimalItem> getAnimalItems()

    • getCrops

      public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getCrops()
      Returns:
      a list of crops currently grown by the farm

    • getCropVarieties

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCropVarieties()
      Returns:
      a list of the types of crop objects owned by farm which is used to determine which type of crop to use items on.

    • getCropItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<CropItem> getCropItems()
      Returns:
      the list of crop items owned by farm

    • getMaxCrops

      public int getMaxCrops()
      Returns:
      maximum amount of crops allowed to be grown at once

    • growCrops

      public void growCrops​(int day)
      matures each crop in farm by
      Parameters:
      day - : amount of days crops grow by 1 at the end of each day

    • consumeAnimalItem

      public void consumeAnimalItem​(AnimalItem item)
      called after animal item is used for feeding
      Parameters:
      item - is removed from inventory

    • consumeCropItem

      public void consumeCropItem​(CropItem item)
      called after crop item is consumed by crops
      Parameters:
      item - is removed from inventory

    • useCropItem

      public void useCropItem​(Crop inCrop, CropItem inCropItem)
      checks if each crop in the farm matches and uses item on all crops of that type
      Parameters:
      inCrop - -the crop type selected for item use
      inCropItem - -item benefits gained by the crop type

    • feedAnimals

      public void feedAnimals​(AnimalItem item)
      feed all animals with
      Parameters:
      item - health and happiness added to fed animals in farm

    • petAnimals

      public void petAnimals()
      pet all animals, increasing their happiness by 1 or by 2 if class perk petting bonus enabled

    • tendFarm

      public void tendFarm()
      farm action to tend to farm spends 1 action point, increases crop size and increase time until happiness decay of farm animals

    • actionValid

      public boolean actionValid()
      Returns:
      boolean whether an action point is available to be spent

    • harvest

      public int harvest()
      harvests all crops ready to be harvested and
      Returns:
      the amount of income generated 0 income if no harvest is ready otherwise action point is expended harvested crops are removed from the farm

    • endDay

      public int endDay()
      give rewards for end of day for each animal
      Returns:
      the money generated from farm animals grows crops by 1 and decreases animal happiness if farm has not been tended to in a while
